content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT 
    count(distinct(JSON_VALUE(value, '$.product_id'))) as CountOfDistinctProducts
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://miniproject3msktred.dfs.core.windows.net/globalmartdata/products.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(doc)
